DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial use 2 2 factorial design ass method cervical preparation prior Dilation Evacuations ( D & Es ) 14 0/7 19 6/7 week gestational age . In total , 160 woman randomize misoprostol alone Dilapan misoprostol separately randomize buccal vaginal administration 400-mcg misoprostol . A total 80 woman receive 400-mcg misoprostol ( 40 vaginal 40 buccal ) . Another 80 woman Dilapan insert use misoprostol ( 40 vaginal 40 buccal ) . Four six hour later , Dilation Evacuation ( D & E ) procedure perform .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Misoprostol Alone Dilapan With Misoprostol Comparing Buccal Vaginal Misoprostol
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study compare efficacy same-day 400-mcg misoprostol alone same-day Dilapan 400-mcg misoprostol cervical preparation prior D & E 14 0/7 19 6/7 week . Patients first randomized misoprostol alone misoprostol-Dilapan , separately randomize use misoprostol buccally vaginally . The primary outcome measure total procedure time . Secondary outcome include D & E procedure time , initial cervical dilation ( measure large Hegar dilator accept without resistance prior start procedure ) , patient-oriented outcome ( side effect buccal vaginal misoprostol ) , patient acceptability satisfaction . The investigator choose randomize controlled trial factorial design conduct Washington Hospital Center Planned Parenthood Metropolitan Washington . A total 180 English speak woman enrol study 160 randomize receive study intervention . The study enroll healthy woman , age 18 , eligible non-urgent D & E 14 0/7 week 19 6/7 week , confirm sonogram . The woman randomize receive either misoprostol alone Dilapan misoprostol . Women randomize receive 400-mcg misoprostol either buccally vaginally . Computer generate randomization utilized assign treatment arm . Approximately 4-6 hour prior procedure , woman randomly assign one follow treatment combination : 1 . Misoprostol 400-mcg vaginally 2 . Misoprostol 400-mcg buccally 3 . Dilapan insertion 400-mcg misoprostol vaginally 4 . Dilapan insertion 400-mcg misoprostol buccally
DOC.criteria: Healthy pregnant woman 18 year age old Eligible nonurgent Dilation Evacuations 14 0/7 19 6/7 week gestation confirm sonogram . Women speak English . Fetal demise Intolerance , allergy contraindication misoprostol Dilapan .
